dc_title_s: Fire Hazard Severity Zones, Inyo County, California, 2007
dc_description_s: This polygon shapefile represents fire hazard severity zones in Inyo County, California. Fire and Resource Assessment Program (Calif.). (2007). Fire Hazard Severity Zones, Inyo County, California, 2007. Fire and Resource Assessment Program (Calif.). Available at: https://purl.stanford.edu/sr391mg3451
